attr.pathogenesis: weakening and flattening of the tracheal cartilage rings

reference: A retrospective study of tracheal collapse in small-breed dogs - https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC11349713/; Tracheal Collapse | Today's Veterinary Practice - https://todaysveterinarypractice.com/respiratory-medicine/tracheal-collapse/
